legacy.full_text: Attending #BoaoForum2023 in Hainan and interviewing old friends. @michele_geraci told me that Europe needs China to solve its problems. @GrahamTAllison holds the belief that China and the US will not enter a cold war. Good to be offline! https://t.co/976HXYcJan

legacy.full_text: Seeing @LeeCamp from US & @georgegalloway from UK at 2nd intl forum for democracy in BJ! Lee is as humerous as when I interviewed him online, and George is so recognizable with his fedora. After three years, China is holding offline meetings and welcoming foreign friends, again. https://t.co/PwxY15uYpY

legacy.full_text: "What I would want from Chinese media is don't let us be forgotten," #EastPalestine resident @ccope27 told Global Times reporter @WenwenWang1127 on her #ITalk show. She blamed US governments and companies for being neglectful and putting profit over people. More to come. https://t.co/ZzFXXZW9Qp
My latest interview. When US authorities cannot help their people, we speak up.

HEAT or EAT? That is a hard choice for many British families in this winter. "No one can tell us for sure how severe the winter will be...it must be desperately worrying for many other people." Founder of 
@Depheruk told GT reporter @WenwenWang1127 in her #ITalk show. https://t.co/M0H7759Ipj
In this interview, I interviewed two British people. See what they say about the UK's cost of living crisis.

Nyungar human rights lawyer Hannah McGlade talked about the racism against Australian Aboriginals on GT reporter @WenwenWang1127's I-Talk show. The govt needs to increase respect for human rights, she said. https://t.co/s08kjtUhrz
My latest interview with an Australian Aboriginal
